title: alterra57
author: alterra57
created_time: December 09, 2022, 12:30:50 PMLast edit: May 03, 2023, 03:51:22 PM by alterra57
content: Crypto fund looking to buy and sell crypto from/to worldwide clients.ESCROW AVAILABLENO ID VERIFICATIONAccepted payment methods:Bank transfer SWIFT - Worldwide transfers. 3000 EUR/USD - NO LIMIT.Bank transfer SEPA - EU or EEA countries only. 300 EUR/USD - NO LIMIT.WISE - Worldwide transfers. 300 EUR/USD - 2000 EUR/USD.Faster Payment System UK banks. - 300 GBP to 2500 GBP.Rules:1. Coins are only released from escrow once your transfer is seen in our bank account.2. Disputes can and will be open if sent amount is not the same amount quoted by the website.3. Disputes can and will be open if money (for any payment method) isn't in our account within 24 hours from the moment you mark the purchase as paid.4. To be added...For a 5% fee you can buy crypto from us in minutes. How much is a 5% fee? If you buy 100 USD worth of crypto the fee is only 5 USD! The fee can and will be lowered for returning customers. We can use escrow through LocalCoinSwap if necessary. It usually takes less than an hour to complete a deal and you don't have to verify your identity with us. Contact:Â Discord: HadesVault#6812Telegram: HadesVaultTelegram Channel: https://t.me/hadesvaultcecLocalCryptos: PM for profile.LocalCoinSwap: PM for profile.We can arrange a call through Discord or Telegram, text is okay too but we would prefer calls. Serious sellers and/or buyers only.Scammers and time wasters, stay away.

comments.author: virginorange
comments.body: Hello,no kyc sounds good.I'm willing to pay a premium, if you can offer Bitcoin which have a short transaction history after being mined.Could you post the address of your Bitcoin, so I can check your history?On Bisq I can buy Bitcoin for:- market price +0% (high probability of a scam / hack history)- market price +3% (from a coinjoin)- market price +4 to +5% (from a regulated exchange)I can also buy non KYC, from a regulated exchange for a market price +4 to +5% via an intermediary.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: virginorange on December 15, 2022, 02:35:18 PMHello,no kyc sounds good.I'm willing to pay a premium, if you can offer Bitcoin which have a short transaction history after being mined.Could you post the address of your Bitcoin, so I can check your history?On Bisq I can buy Bitcoin for:- market price +0% (high probability of a scam / hack history)- market price +3% (from a coinjoin)- market price +4 to +5% (from a regulated exchange)I can also buy non KYC, from a regulated exchange for a market price +4 to +5% via an intermediary.Hi,I'm not selling freshly mined BTC but selling BTC coming from one of the following CEX:BitfinexBitstampKrakenHuobiBinanceOKXCoinbaseBybitKuCoinGeminiUpbitBithumbIf you have history on escrow websites please send me your profile in a DM, I'll send you mine too.

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Well, I can't tell whether I'm seeing a legit seller being criticised by two trolls, or a very careful scammer being exposed by two good members.virginorange, how was your trade with alterra57? The fact that a member account wants to buy and sell crypto for a fund naturally arouses suspicion, but the rank and the way others are saying that this is a scam... it is not that they are worthy of my trust, in fact, it seems that SMB and Maasdamer are the same person, but why spread FUD about a stranger from different accounts if he did nothing to him?Good luck with your business alterra57, if you are well intentioned
